strDescriptionEN: McLaren Racing Limited is a British motor racing team based at the McLaren Technology Centre, Woking, Surrey, England. McLaren is best known as a Formula One constructor and also has a history of competing in American open wheel racing as both an entrant and a chassis constructor. The team is the second oldest active team and one of the most successful teams in Formula One, having won 183 races, 12 Drivers' Championships and 8 Constructors' Championships.
